channel.title: Stairs help
channel.description: Hello, eh rofl, i need to figure out how to add height to a teleport such as stairs, like make them take you upstairs or etc, i think i know but im not 100% sure o.O

item.title: Stairs help
item.dc:creator: @Mad_Man_Joe6 Mad Man Joe6
item.description:
@Mad_Man_Joe6 wrote:

Well, you already know how to make the object teleport you yes?

All you need to do is add height to it, e.g.

person.teleportToX = absX; person.teleportToY = absY; person.heightLevel = heightLevel;

Change the coordinates to where you want it to go, and depending if you want the stairs to take you up or down, change the height level to fit.

Read full topic
